meanings.sent1: The screechiest bird woke me up early with its loud call.
meanings.sent2: The screechiest noise came from the rusty gate as it opened.
meanings.sent3: The screechiest cat in the neighborhood always gets stuck in the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her screechiest laughter echoed through the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The screechiest brakes on the old car made everyone jump.

meanings.definition: The most high-pitched and loud in sound
meanings.sent1: The screechiest of all the car alarms blared in the night.
meanings.sent2: The screechiest was the sound of the microphone feedback.
meanings.sent3: The screechiest at the concert made everyone cover their ears.
meanings.sent4: His screechiest shout could be heard across the field.
meanings.sent5: The screechiest of the sirens signaled the arrival of the fire truck.
